cu.explanation_en: Setting the number of PUSCH threads to an invalid type will cause thread initialization failure and prevent uplink processing.

du.explanation_en: Setting the maximum MIMO layers to zero will cause MIMO configuration failure and prevent multi-antenna transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將最大 MIMO 層數設定為零將導致 MIMO 配置失敗，並阻止多天線傳輸。
